38466373.review:
Anyone looking for a fantastic platforming game need look no further.

Find You is a 2D platformer that manages to feature a brilliant art style and amazing platforming action. Every level in the game is cleverly designed to keep you thinking, and there is never a moment i found to be cheap or unfair. Every new level tests your skills in new ways, and every collectable only adds to the experience. The design of the levels gives you a chance to gush over how smoothly the characters control and move.

Definitely recommended, and may many hours of joy come.

38362361.review:
Find You, é um jogo , que lhe da o controle de um ou mais bonecos do cenário, que devem se encontrar e se juntarem, e o jogo é baseado nisso, com 100 levels e fases bônus que se desbloqueiam com figuras faciais encontradas em cada fase ! 
O jogo requer paciência e lógica, pois além do mais , controlas todos os bonecos do cenário . Dando isso uma certa dificuldade .

36510960.review:
В поисках игры, в которой мне было бы интересно и не скучно, я наткнулся на Find You.
Что же такое Find You? Попробую вам рассказать.
Find You -  когда 30 минут не можешь пройти уровень, а потом проходишь его с одной попытки
Find You - когда заходишь на 10 минут, а остаешься на целый вечер
Find You - довольно хорошая БЕСПЛАТНАЯ игра, чтобы скоротать время, ну и проверить, на что способны твои мозги
Find You -  (удивительно!) интересная и не скучная игра, понравится даже не мега-интеллектуалам
Find You - нет, все-таки надо быть мега-интеллектуалом
Find You - мир чудес, зашел без мозгов, а вышел уже с ними
Становитесь умнее, саморазвивайтесь, играйте в интеллектуальные игры.
Спасибо, что дочитали до конца. Все, я пошел в Find You, чего и вам желаю.

36258663.review:
Gostei mais do que eu achei que iria. O conceito é super hyper simples, mas o desafio consegue ser ao mesmo tempo complicado como gratificante. A música, texturas e backgrounds vão se repetir MUITO então se prepare para ver muita repetição. Felizmente o jogo consegue compensar isso te trazendo sempre algumas pequenas mudanças favorecendo os quebra cabeças como por exemplo; do nada seu clone anda invertido; existem portais que você precisa tocar; plataformas que não lhe deixam pular... etc. 

Essas coisas todas liberadas para você brincar na Edição de Fases, talvez a parte mais divertida na minha opinião. É super simples, mas te da liberdade de fazer o level tão complicado quanto queira. Contando que ela não seja impossível, você pode facilmente postar na workshop da steam para que seus amigos baixam. 

Enfim, é um jogo indie super simples, com 100 levels e uma Level Editor. É agradável de se jogar e certamente vai tomar a sua atenção por um tempinho. Ainda mais sendo de graça, não tem motivo não pelo menos tentar. Recomendo. 

7.5/10

35535129.review:
虽然是一款英文游戏，但它要求的英文水平很低，对于英语什么不存在的玩家来说，只要大脑够用啥都看不懂也能打通100关，并且这款益智[spoiler] 大脑爆炸	[/spoiler]游戏是免费的，作者没有义务给你增添中文。


说他是小游戏一点也不假，画质咋看咋像街机游戏，特别是它的方块让我想起了魂斗罗。但它的内容量真的很大，点击游戏映入眼帘的就是密密麻麻的100关，而每一关都需要不同程度的思考才能破解，它的通关时间与一些大作相比差不了多少。


再说说操作，游戏操作很简单，只是动动键盘让小人相聚，或是让小人到各自的黄色方块里。说是很简单，实际上很多关都需要展开思考的，至于你操作的小人，可不止是小黄人，还有和你对着干的小黑人和懒得理你的坐禅大叔，就连小人走的路在后期也有变化，开发者可真是考虑周到[spoiler] 丧心病狂	[/spoiler]。


虽然游戏很益智，可以说是很不错的游戏，可它还是有美中不足的地方，那就是它的菜单选项。说实话，游戏选项真的很坑人，就比如右下角的红色叉叉不是退出游戏，而是删存档，游戏玩懵逼了关的时候一定要注意！本人已经被坑过一次了，现在从头再来已经没动力了。

35364649.review: I find this game to be a very simple game to just come onto, and test your strategic skills, the game is about having to take one person through a bunch of levels/courses so you can re-unite with the others. it is a Single-Player game that i find to catagorize as surpassingly fun! By having 100+ mind-boggling courses and routes that make you navigate through an really put your brain-power to the pedal with a ton of lvls having to do with riddles, mind-twisting courses and some levels where you have to take on multiple characters at once. i would rate this an 8.5 /10 because the game is still being worked on and is evolving more and more.

35281330.review:
"Find you" is a materialistically designed puzzle platformer with surprisingly interesting puzzles.

Don't be put off by a minimalistic (Well, I　almost use it as an euphemism. It looks like a school project, really) design. Whatever the game lacks in looks, it makes it up in puzzles. Simultaneously controlled characters, changing gravity, together with traditional for the genre buttons, crates and spikes - create an endless possibilities of clever, more logic based, rather then skill based puzzles. It feels like games "Binaries", "VVVVVV" and "Escape Goat" rolled into one - constantly forcing you to think outside of the box rather than to press buttons fast enough.

Anther aspect that I hope will take off in the future - level editor and modding possibility. If you always felt like creating platform puzzles is what you should do in life, but  were too busy figuring out the intricate science of creating a game - "Find You" is a perfect starting point to put you talent to test.

35162623.review:
This little platformer game is great on so many levels: it's progression and how it introduces new puzzle mechanics every few stages, it's music (a great selection of CC-licensed tracks) and it's just-right difficulty. This is a puzzle game that doesn't make me feel stupid. It doesn't require a FAQ to beat it if you use the hint system wisely, and it's so rewarding.

Oh, and it's free to play! There's nothing here to complain about. Great game and kudos to the developer!

[/code]
一款玩法新颖烧脑游戏，挑战性强。
在你摔键盘/手柄之前，不妨试试看脑补下人物的爱恨情长。我怨自己不能多生出只手吃瓜。

[u]游戏玩法[/u]
平台跳跃，复数个角色被[i]同时[/i]操控，玩家的最终目的是使[i]他们[/i]相遇。任何一人碰到陷阱即失败。
陷阱、机关种类丰富。通过收集笑脸可以解锁提示和额外关卡。共100关。

[i]“同时”[/i]——同时只用↑↓←→操纵屏幕内所有角色，他们会按照指示同一时间同方向移动。不能选择特定一人，需要同时考虑全部角色。
[i]“他们”[/i]——需要相遇的角色包括：小黄人、倒立小黑人、坐禅不动小黄人。敌人只有机器人，既不能让它碰到小人，又不能死。

[u]感想[/u]
[h1]如果这世上真有更高力量的存在，那么它一定是多线程的[/h1]
超护眼游戏背景，宏大的背景音乐，玩到后来真给我一种仿佛自己是神的错觉。作为有着榆木脑袋的神，真的很难办到同时想好几个人会不会撞到陷阱呢。

关卡设计超赞，共玩了94关没怎么有遇到重复。每关都需要琢磨一下，不能按平常地无脑跳跃前进。

它这么棒居然免费！

35158106.review:
[h1]Introduction[/h1]
Find You is a free game where you control [b]every[/b] character on screen (exept the ones that are sitting down who can't be bothered to move). It is a puzzle platformer where with (over) 100 levels, in which you must make every character touch to complete.

[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list]
[*]Well designed
[*]Innovative
[*]Decent graphics
[*]Cool music
[*]Workshop support
[*]Dev has been supporting the game with updates to fix various stuffs
[*]Probably some other things I forgot to mention
[/list]

[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
[*]Game is undeniable proof that I am an idoit...
[*]Can't buy the soundtrack (which I realize is not a sweeping 20-track epic of epicness but I would still pay at least 99 cents for it)
[/list]

[h1]Conclusion[/h1]
To be honest, the dev could have charged a buck or two for this. It is fun [b]and[/b] free so there's no reason not to get this...unless you get frustrated real easy.

35079227.review:
Find You offers well crafted platforming puzzles, an inbuilt level editor and most importantly smooth physics that completely enable player control. Its antiquated presentation may be off-putting at first, but the gameplay is consistently on point with great level design and a gentle learning curve.

The main mechanics are nothing new but so cleverly put together and gradually introduced within 111 levels that they never feel monotonous. Plain logical puzzling, observing and planning lies at its core in all puzzles. Every possible aspect, even the most peripheral physical circumstance, is woven into a level. This makes some puzzles very finicky, requiring timing, precision and dexterity. However, the controls are tight and responsive so that it's always possible to fiddle a way through where intended.

While the graphics are certainly nothing to write home about, the clean sprites at the very least help focus on the gameplay. The music on the other hand can be distracting with a contradicting beat in levels where cadence is of importance. Usually though, the background music is unobtrusive.

Surprisingly polished gameplay renders Find You a worthwhile puzzle platformer with potential additional content thanks to the workshop integration and the easy to use ingame level editor.

35073641.review:
A pretty fun platformer game with some nice mechanics. It could have used the "long jump", where you jump under a arrow and keep the forward momentum, a little more, as that was the most fun mechanic of the game. The challenges are all well balanced, so it never feels unfair. Well, maybe the last stage feels hard, but that's more to do with its longevity. The music isn't the greatest, but it fits the genre. Too bad it has this title, "Find You", but it doesn't explore any kind of storyline. Even the simplest thing would have sufficed, but this game just doesn't have it.

Overall, it's a pretty enjoyable platformer. Try it out.

34941791.review:
人間を動かして、いろいろな目的を達成するパズルゲーム。

ステージによって目的が異なり、人間をゴールに運ぶ単純なものから、動かした方向と逆に動く人間を接触させるもの、複数の人間を一か所に集めるものなどバリエーション豊か。
それらが合わせて100ステージほどある。

さらには、ステージエディットにも対応しており、自分でステージを作ったり、他の人が作ったステージをプレイすることも可能。

ゲーム自体も非常に軽く、Steamが動くPCで動かないという事はまずないと思われる。
有料ならどうかなと思ってしまうゲームではあるが、無料でサクッとプレイできるので、シビアなゲームに飽きてきたら、頭の体操代わりにやってみるのもよいかと。

34841615.review:
Jeżeli nie interesuję ciebie pełna recenzja, to przewiń do podsumowania.

 Find You to gra platformowo-logiczna. Sterujemy w niej ludkiem lub ludzikami. Chodzi w niej o to, że ludki poruszają się tak samo (wyjątkiem jest ludzik odwrotny). Naszym celem jest, albo spotkanie wszystkich ludzików ze sobą, albo spotkanie ich z medytującym bohaterem, albo dojście ich wszystkich do drzwi. 

 Gra jest ciekawa i nie jest przedewszystkim nudna. Aby przedłużyć nasz czas gry, twórcy dodali edytor poziomów, dzięki czemu możemy kreować nasze poziomy i dzielić się z innymi graczami, naszymi etapami.

Poziomy są na początku proste, lecz z czasem są coraz bardziej wymagające oraz pojawiają się w nich inne przeszkody. 
Przykładem jest pojawienie się ludka potwora, który gdy dotknie zwykłych postaci, gra się kończy. Nie może on jednocześnie nie może spaść. 

Podsumowując:
Gra jest świetną platformówką logiczną. Można się przyniej dobrze bawić. Gra wydłuża się dzięki edytorowi poziomów.
Każdy następny etap jest coraz trudniejszy.

34740427.review:
Als erstes:
ich bin ein Freund und B.o.S. Student für Game Engineering im selben Kurs wie der Entwickler.
So da ihr nun wisst in welchen Kontext ich zum Spiel stehe hier meine Meinung:

Find You ist im groben und ganzen ein Puzzle fokussierter Plattformer der zwar nicht durch sein Grafik- und Sounddesign, aber durch sein Gameplay besticht.

Falls Videomaterial für dich interessanter ist hier meine Video-Review dazu:
https://youtu.be/HOm6nR40Se0

Im Gegensatz zur Grafik bieten die verschiedenen Mechaniken große Abwechslung in den einzelnen Levels. Das Spiel setzt mich auch nicht unter einen Zeitdruck, wie es so viele andere Puzzle Jump-and-Runers tun, um die Level zu lösen welches dazu führt das man jeden einzelnen Sprung gut planen kann um am Ende den sorgfältig erdachten Ablauf am Stück durch führen zu können.
Die Schwierigkeit der einzelnen Rätsel reichen von Einführung in eine Mechanik bis zu Schädelspalter, bleiben aber dabei immer noch eindeutig logisch/Skilltechnisch nachvollziehbar
Ich habe das Spiel mit den X-Box 360 Controller durch gespielt und fand, als ich die Tastatur ausprobiert, es überraschenderweise genau so gut steuerbar.

Alles im allem kann man bis auf die Minimalistische Grafik und Sounds nicht viel kritisieren, für ein Ein-Mann, Non-Professional Game ist das eine gute Leistung und es ist Kostenlos, ich habe schon 60€ für Spiele hin gelegt die nie das Licht der digitalen Welt hätten sehen soll und finde dieses Projekt empfehlenswert

34740247.review:
Dieses Spiel ist perfekt für zwischendurch!

Es bietet zur Zeit 100 Level, welche immer schwieriger werden und immer wieder neue Level-Ideen bekommen (Mehrere Spielfiguren gleichzeitig steuern, Umkehren der Schwerkraft usw.). 
Auch die Level sind übersichtlich gestaltet und sehr gut durchdacht!

Sollte man mal wirklich nicht mehr weiterkommen, kann man sich seit dem letzen Update auch Tipps freispielen, sodass man nicht für immer in einem Level hängen bleiben kann.

Besonder gefallen hat mir, dass man teilweise nicht nur eine Spielfigur steuert, sondern gleichzeitig auf mehrere Figuren achten muss. Das macht das Spiel nochmals um einiges interessanter und schwieriger, da jede Figur ihren eigenen Weg bewältigen muss, oder die beiden Spielfiguren sich nicht ausversehen berühren dürfen.

Wenn ihr gerne ein paar Rätsel lösen möchtet und euch auch nicht von schwierigen Rätseln demotivieren lasst, dann kann ich euch das Spiel auf jeden Fall empfehlen!

Bin mal gespannt, bis wann ich alle Level bewältigt habe :D
